creator.name: Militair commando van Curaçao
creator.his_func: The highest military authority was vested in the Governor. There was also a commander of the garrison but he was subordinated to the Governor. From the 17th century, male white citizens were obliged to serve in a militia or civil guard. The citizens chose their officers from amongst themselves. During the 18th century a separate free coloured and a free black armed unit were established, which also fell directly under the command of the Governor until the end of the 18th century. During the 19th century the civil militia was maintained.
